Address.value: 1030 WEST GEORGIA STREET,SUITE 1830, VANCOUVER, British Columbia, V6E 2Y3, Canada

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Gold Royalty Corp is a precious metals-focused royalty and streaming company. It offers creative financing solutions to the metals and mining industry. The company's mission is to acquire royalties, streams and similar interests at varying stages of the mine life cycle to build a balanced portfolio offering near, medium and longer-term attractive returns for investors.
